content: {"updates": [{"pattern": "The \\*\\*hiring model we’ve followed for decades is dead\\.\\*\\*", "replacement": "The **hiring model we're following is dead.**"}, {"pattern": "this audience", "replacement": "you"}, {"pattern": "The only people who will be relevant in the next 12 months are those who use AI to systemize their expertise—and are willing to accept that.", "replacement": "In the next 12 months, only those who use AI to systemize their expertise—and accept that reality—will stay relevant."}, {"pattern": "drop a comment saying “I’m in,” repost this, and DM me your email.", "replacement": "comment “I’m in,” repost this, & DM your email."}]}
